title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Mobile App-Based International Classification of Nursing Practice (ICNP) Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze five clinical cases in a mobile app and apply ICNP classification system-based nursing interventions with 80% accuracy.
Through app-based educational games, learners can define 20 core ICNP terms with over 90% accuracy.
After completing the user guide module, learners can connect the four core domains of the ICNP classification system (diagnosis/intervention/outcome/role) to real-world cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
